title: 205A-Odyssey: Man of Constant Sorrow
itunes:title: 205A-Odyssey: Man of Constant Sorrow
description:
With monsters, witches, sirens, and cyclopes, the Odyssey is one of the landmarks of world literature and a classic for the ages. This is the start of Odysseus's long journey home from a war that he didn't want to join in the first place.

The creature is a big monster with one small request: all the water in the world forever.

Chipfingers: https://myths.link/chipfingers

--

--

Music:

"PlainGrey" by Blue Dot Sessions

“Cavern” by Jahzzar

“Owls” by Jahzzar

"Boston Landing" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Zelus" by Blue Dot Sessions

“Play the Hook and Leave” by Steve Combs

“Domani – Tomorrow” by Emanuele Dentoni

“Be Nice” by Jahzzer

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
